item.title: PowerShell Classes - Validating ARM parameters
item.description: Origin‚ùì (shameless plug, alert!) üôÉ Recently, I was discussing with my colleague about this new book I am co-authoring (with Prateek) about why to learn .NET to be a better PowerShell programmer and upon further discussion we pondered some interesting ways to use PowerShell classes.
